title: How Miley Cyrus and Kaitlynn Carter Are Coping After Their Breakup
text:
From ELLE

Miley Cyrus declared to the world she is single yesterday when she posted nine Instagrams of herself looking hot on vacation in Utah. They were her first non-work-related posts since news broke last weekend of her and Kaitlynn Carter's month-long relationship ending. In the 24 hours since, new details have come out about how both women are coping with the end of their whirlwind romance.

ELLE.com was told by a source that Cyrus initially pursued a serious relationship with Carter after their August Italy vacation before deciding she needed to focus on her career. Carter supports Cyrus, and both women are moving on.

E! and People got similar details from sources about how Cyrus decided she needed to focus on herself for a while.

As background, Cyrus and Carter's public romance started last month after news of Cyrus' separation from her husband Liam Hemsworth was publicly announced. Carter and her husband Brody Jenner announced their own separation in early August.

Sources told Page Six that Cyrus and Hemsworth had privately been separated for months, and Cyrus stressed in a statement on Twitter that rumors she cheated on Hemsworth during their marriage were false. "Once Liam & I reconciled, I meant it, & I was committed," she wrote. "There are NO secrets to uncover here....I can admit to a lot of things but I refuse to admit that my marriage ended because of cheating."

People reported yesterday that Cyrus ended things with Hemsworth to work on herself. “Miley split from Liam to focus on herself. Her relationship with Kaitlynn was a happy surprise,” a source told the outlet. “However, Miley was so invested in her relationship with Liam for a long time. She felt her relationship with Kaitlynn was almost moving in that direction, too.”

An E! source echoed People's in a report published yesterday: "Miley feels like she got in over her head by moving on so quickly with Kaitlynn Carter after her split from Liam," the source said.

A second E! source said that Cyrus is on vacation with her mother and sister this week, taking some time away to recharge. "Miley is hanging out with her family and staying close to them right now," the source said. "She's trying to disconnect from everything that's been going on. She's ready to focus on herself and not have to worry about anyone else."

That source added that Carter is moving back into her own place; they moved in together after their Italy trip, People initially reported. "Kaitlynn is still surprised and upset about how abruptly things ended," the source said, adding that "there is not a lot of contact between Miley and Kaitlynn."

A third source contradicted that to E!, saying that Carter and Cyrus "remain close friends."

People reported similarly when their breakup was first announced, with a source telling the outlet that “they’re still friends. They’ve been friends forever and were there for each other when they were both getting separated, but they’re just not in a romantic relationship anymore.”

As for Hemsworth and Cyrus now? They aren't talking, a source told E!, and haven't been. Cyrus "still cares" about him, but she is "not looking to be in touch," the source said.

You Might Also Like
description: Both are moving on, just in different ways.
